text: Jaime Alomar Florit (born 24 December 1937) is a retired Spanish road racing cyclist, who competed professionally between 1959 and 1968. He won the 1961 Tour de Picardie, the 1963 Coppa Ugo Agostoni and the third stage of 1963 Giro d'Italia, and rode the Tour de France in 1961, 1962 and 1967. His elder brother Francisco Alomar was also a professional cyclist. == References == Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Jaime Alomar
